metadata.strong: when a gun is present in a domestic violence situation, the likelihood that a woman will be shot and killed increases fivefold.
metadata.span: For this analysis, dangerous behaviors that would qualify as a “red flag” include any of the following, if observed within 3 years of the shooting: a recent threat of violence, act of violence or attempted act of violence towards self or others; a conviction for certain firearms offenses (including unlawful and reckless use, display or brandishing); a violation of a protective order; evidence of ongoing abuse of controlled substances or alcohol.
